thread.title: Kat Von D Beauty’s newly revamped Unlock-It wipes will remove EVERYTHING
thread.title_full: Kat Von D Beauty’s newly revamped Unlock-It wipes will remove EVERYTHING

author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
title: Kat Von D Beauty’s newly revamped Unlock-It wipes will remove EVERYTHING
text:
Kat Von D Beauty’s newly revamped Unlock-It wipes will remove EVERYTHING Just about anyone who has tried Kat Von D Beauty’s products can speak to how amazingly well they stay put — their long-wear formulas just can’t be beat! But everything that comes on must eventually come off, so and it looks like their newly revamped Unlock-It wipes will remove just about anything and everything ! It doesn’t matter if it’s lipstick, eyeshadow, foundation or liner, all of Kat’s makeup products have truly unbelievable staying powder, so it’s pretty perfect that they’d come up with a truly effective and affordable face wipe for removing them!
The current version of the Unlock-It Makeup Remover Wipes are pretty spectacular as they are, so we can’t wait to see how powerful this new formula will be!
Nancy McGuire, Kat Von D Beauty’s VP of Product Development has given us a look at some upcoming products that are truly long lasting and won’t budge no matter what we put them through!
All the NEW products in development are SO #longlasting ‼️‼️ #katvondbeauty #bts #comingsoon #longwear #fullcoverage #pigment @katvondbeauty 
A post shared by @nmcg30 on Feb 28, 2017 at 11:48am PST 
We need to know what they are!
She also gives us a look at how powerful the new Unlock-It wipes are since they just slide that makeup right off as if it’s nothing!
But they come off with the NEW Unlock-it Makeup Remover Wipes #comingsoon #katvondbeauty @katvondbeauty #unlockit #longwear #longlasting 
A post shared by @nmcg30 on Feb 28, 2017 at 11:50am PST 
What is this magic!?
No word yet on when these beauties will be released and replace the old version . We can only assume that they’ll be sold for around the same price as the originals, $10. Seems pretty reasonable for such powerful wipes!
And while we’re speculating, what could those beautiful products on her arm be?! They’ve gotta be liquid lipsticks, don’t you think? They could also be the new Studded Kiss formula, though, which would be very exciting as well! Keep your eyes peeled for news on the wipes and more over on Kat Von D Beauty’s social media, we don’t want to miss a thing.
